title: Challenge Personalization
description: Personalization settings for loyalty challenges including task configurations, product restrictions, goals, and time windows.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: Reward
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: Reward for completing the entire challenge.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: Tasks
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: List of tasks within the challenge.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: Excluded Item Labels
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: List of product SKU/categories/labels excluded from qualifying for this task.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: Included Item Labels
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: List of product SKUs/categories/labels that can qualify for this task.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: multiDay
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: Multi-day visit requirements for task completion.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: Contiguous
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: Whether the visits must be on consecutive days.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: Max Repeats
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: Maximum number of times this task can be repeated.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: Time of Day
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: Time window during the day for which the challenge is active.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: Start
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: Start time in minutes from midnight (e.g., 720 for 12:00 PM).

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.title: End
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/ajo/loya.description: End time in minutes from midnight (e.g., 900 for 3:00 PM).
